marketing information: T1900 Rackmount LCD is a flexible, 1U device that manages servers in data centers, server rooms and other space critical environments, directly from the racks in which they are installed. Connecting to KVM switches, the T1900 combines video, keyboard and touchpad functionality so you can manage a rack or multiple racks of servers, from a single workstation. Support Windows, Sun, Linux and other operating system. On-Screen Display (OSD) supporting multiple languages and front panel controls. Compatibility with any KVM switch for out-of-band server access at-the-rack.
